user.title: Search for cryptocurrencies
user.description: Search for cryptocurrencies by name, symbol, or ID. Leave empty to browse the top 100.

data_description.search_query: Enter a cryptocurrency name, symbol, or ID to search. Example: bitcoin, btc, ethereum

select_crypto.title: Select cryptocurrencies
select_crypto.description: Select one or more cryptocurrencies to track.

data_description.selected_cryptos: Select the cryptocurrencies you want to track

data_description.id: Unique name for this sensor (e.g., 'My Wallet', 'Trading Portfolio').
data_description.currency_name: Currency to display prices in (usd, eur, gbp, etc.).
data_description.unit_of_measurement: Currency symbol to display (e.g., $, €, £). Leave empty for none.
data_description.multipliers: Amount of each cryptocurrency you own, separated by commas. Must match the number of selected cryptocurrencies.
data_description.update_frequency: How often to refresh prices (minutes). Minimum 1 minute.
data_description.min_time_between_requests: Minimum delay between API requests (minutes). Shared across all sensors.
